title: Runaway Lugaai
overview: Rajnikant Sinha (Rajni), the only child of MLA Narendra Sinha, is far from his namesake. He is a submissive man who has lived his entire life under his father's thumb as a pawn. He could neither stand up to his father nor live up to his expectations. His life took a turn for the better when Rajni met and married Bulbul - a beautiful, chirpy, and free-spirited girl. However, his happiness did not last for long as soon enough Bulbul, made a bold decision to run away without a trace. What then begins is a chase to find the missing Bulbul and why she went missing - from the cops to speculation by the press, the unending games of politicians, and even an ex-lover in the mix - there are multiple reasons at play in this adventure.
